detailed_events.description: LeBron James (#23) takes a contested fadeaway jumper from just inside the free-throw line and scores, tying the game.
LeBron James recovers the loose ball after a deflection, initiating a fast break for the Lakers.
detailed_events.location: Near the top of the key

detailed_events.description: On a fast break, LeBron James drives to the basket and finishes with a powerful one-handed dunk.
With the shot clock at one second, LeBron James hits a difficult, contested, long fadeaway jumper from the top of the key. His foot was on the 3-point line, making it a 2-point shot.
LeBron James (#6) executes a chase-down block, pinning a Houston Rockets player's layup attempt against the backboard.
LeBron James (Lakers) drives to the basket on a fast break and completes a powerful one-handed dunk.
LeBron James (Lakers) performs a chase-down block on a fast-break layup attempt by an Oklahoma City Thunder player, swatting the ball against the backboard.
An unidentified Lakers player loses control of the ball near the three-point line, and Tyler Herro (Heat) recovers it to start a fast break.
detailed_events.location: Near the top of the key

detailed_events.description: On a fast break, LeBron James (Lakers) executes a signature chase-down block, pinning Tyler Herro's (Heat) dunk attempt against the backboard.
Dennis Schröder (Lakers) comes from behind and pokes the ball loose from Terry Rozier (Hornets) near midcourt.
Following the steal, Dennis Schröder and LeBron James start a 2-on-1 fast break for the Lakers.
On the fast break, Dennis Schröder (Lakers) throws a lob pass off the backboard for LeBron James.
LeBron James (Lakers) catches the alley-oop pass from the backboard and finishes the play with a two-handed reverse dunk.
A Washington Wizards player takes a three-point shot from the right wing which misses off the rim.
Austin Reaves of the Lakers secures the offensive rebound after the missed three-point shot by the Wizards.
Austin Reaves passes the ball to LeBron James who is cutting towards the basket.
LeBron James drives to the basket and makes a contested layup while being fouled for an and-one opportunity.
detailed_events.location: In the paint, right side of the basket

detailed_events.description: Austin Reaves drives into the paint, drawing the defense, and delivers a pass to LeBron James cutting along the baseline.
LeBron James receives the pass from Austin Reaves and finishes with a powerful two-handed dunk.
Terance Mann of the LA Clippers drives baseline, gets caught in the air, and throws a bad pass that is intercepted by the Lakers, initiating a fast break.
Following the turnover by the Clippers, the Lakers initiate a fast break up the court.
On the fast break, Malik Monk (#5) throws a pass ahead to a streaking LeBron James.
LeBron James catches the pass on the fast break and finishes with a two-handed dunk.
LeBron James drives from the top of the key to the right side of the basket and scores a layup in traffic.
LeBron James drives from the left wing into the paint and makes a contested scoop layup while being fouled. The basket is counted for an and-one opportunity.
A Minnesota Timberwolves player (Andrew Wiggins, #22) jumps out of bounds to save the ball but throws an errant pass directly to an opponent.
Immediately after the steal, LeBron James catches the ball and shoots a quick three-pointer from the right wing.
LeBron James, with the ball on the right wing, drives past his defender along the baseline and goes up for a reverse layup. The clip cuts as the ball goes in.
Lakers player #23 (LeBron James) pulls up for a very deep three-point shot from the left wing and makes it over the defender.
detailed_events.location: Left wing, beyond the three-point arc
